subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{vern|Chinese toon}} ({{taxlink|Toona sinensis|species|ver=180925}}), a type of tree that blooms white flowers in the summer and has edible leaves
# [[tree of heaven]] (''[[Ailanthus altissima]]'')
# {{lb|zh|metaphorical}} [[father]]
# of advanced age
